name: Mango Ensalada
description: This Mango Ensalada is a healthful delight, embodying all things fresh and nutritious. Tagged as low-carb and low-sodium, it's perfect for those seeking a healthier twist on classic recipes. Dive into the freshness of tomatoes, mango, cucumber, and more in this vibrant and healthy dish.

recipeInstructions.text: Chop the tomatoes, dice the yellow pepper and red onion, and peel and cube the cucumber and mango.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, combine the chopped tomatoes, diced yellow pepper, cubed cucumber, cubed mango, and sliced red onion.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Drizzle the salad with 4 tablespoons of cane vinegar and toss well to coat all the ingredients evenly.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Allow the salad to marinate for at least 15 minutes before serving to enhance the flavors.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4
